title: Tahm Kench /dance song is too quiet
body: His regular voice overs are fine, but the bilgewater music he plays during his dance emote is as quiet as a whisper for me.

replies.body:
This is when he plays the tongue?    (It is tagged as a VO line and should be the same level as your VO.)


Overall his voice (and esp that song) is lower frequency-- which doesn't play as loudly on cans or earbuds.   (Esp earbuds).    You might try raising the bass setting for your speakers/headphones.
